attributes.action: Require that all calls to 09xx premium rate numbers provide a non-chargeable 30 second warning message about the rate before charging begins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Premium rate calls beginning with the 09 prefix should carry a non-chargeable 30 second warning that advises people of the rate (per minute and/or per call) and gives them the option to end the call before charging begins.  
This is particularly important since a number of scams are now using 09xx numbers and we must protect the public from being unwitting victims.
